text: Nintendogs + Cats is a video game sequel of Nintendogs. It was released in North America on March 26, 2011. This game has a total of 3 versions. It is made for the Nintendo 3DS. On April 26, 2011, just one month after this game was released in North America, Nintendogs + Cats have sold 1.7 million copies of the game. == Ratings == Common Sense Media gave this game 5 out of 5 stars. == Features == Nintendogs + Cats has more features than Nintendogs, like a RoboDog and cats. == References == Category:2011 video games Category:Casual games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Nintendo 3DS games Category:Nintendo Entertainment Analysis and Development games Category:Nintendo Network games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about cats Category:Video games about dogs Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual pet video games
title: Nintendogs + Cats
